title: How-To: Redacting Data from a Repository
description:
Explains how to redact sensitive fields or patterns from existing data in a repository,
typically via targeted delete or overwrite operations performed by administrators.

examples.name: Conceptual redaction example
examples.description: Illustrative example of replacing sensitive values with a redacted marker.
examples.query: UPDATE events SET card_number="REDACTED" WHERE card_number IS NOT NULL
